name: Dragonwing
description: Your leathery wings spring from your back, built to carry you aloft. (Flying speed equal to normal speed?)

name: Dragonscale
description: Your body is coated in a lustrous set of scales. (Defense Increase)

name: Dragonclaw
description: Your hands and feet end in sharp claws, designed to rip the flesh of your enemies. (Unarmed attack with claws...)

name: Imperious Size
description: Dragonfolk are the tallest and largest of the races.

name: Hoarding Instinct
description: At some point in a dragonfolk's early life, they develop an attachement to something and begin hoarding it. This instinct can be fought but typically isn't. (The character has a hoard of something (gold, jewels, shiny rocks, furniture, friends, etc.) and will attempt to obtain more when they see the chance.)
